item.p1nero_bow.mortis_innate.tooltip1: Press [%s] when shooting to cancel movement.
item.p1nero_bow.mortis_innate.tooltip2: Upon unleashing a basic attack, press [%s] to deliver a devastating melee strike and reset your combo.
item.p1nero_bow.mortis_innate.tooltip3: When the stack reaches its zenith, the power of twin arrows is bestowed upon you.
